website_summaries.verdict: This muzzle works best with smaller breeds and puppies, but it will also provide temporary restraint for larger dogs.
pros: Set of 5 muzzles makes proper sizing easier
Stops nipping and biting for grooming and medical treatments
cons: Construction material is clearly inexpensive, not durable
Dogs can chew through straps quickly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Doggy.  Happy Mommy.
customer_reviews.text: Priced well. Each muzzle comes with a clip. The three biggest ones were the most useful. I am training a great pyrenees/german shepherd mix not to eat my younger goat and the chickens. It has worked well and she has grown accustomed to wearing the muzzle with no discomfort to her. She seems like a very happy dog and the goats and chickens are happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Cedar Grove Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more on a better made muzzle.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this set, not once, BUT TWICE. The first time I thought someone put it on our Beagle wrong, and it ended up shredding it. So when this set arrived today, I put it on the dog myself, and within a matter of minutes, the dog shredded it again.. she tried pushing it off with her paws, and the cheaply made vinyl product shredded like a hot knife thru butter. Spend a few bucks more and get one made of better material or different design.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: The size I needed didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to train 2 of my dogs to stop fighting with each other. One is a 7 lb chihuahua (the instigator) and one is an 80lb mix. The smallest size fit my chihuahua but the next to biggest size was defective. The muzzle part fit his snout but there wasn’t enough length on the adjuster to fit him, he does not have a big head so it should have fit. Quality wise I wouldn’t use these for much besides a time out for a couple of minutes. The fabric is somewhat cheap so I’m not sure it would withstand a dog that was determined to get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our two Chihuahua mixes have some serious nail-trimming issues so I ordered these and they are perfect!! I love the five different sizes because our four dogs are all also different sizes. I never thought I would ever put one of these on a dog of mine because I used to think they were cruel.....well, I never had Chihuahuas before!! They can still eat the little pieces of bribery ham while I'm sanding their nails. I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani G

customer_reviews.title: They broke after 3-4 uses
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product all. The muzzle snap connections break so easily, all of them have. My return window has closed so I'm out the money. Do not buy this product for medium to large puppies. It will not work or last, and especially for Adult dogs unless they are older and have been accustomed to a soft muzzle, like way older. It was itchy on my puppies nose, flimsy material ripped easily underneath in the bottom mouth area. I would definitely like my money back. Seller if you don't like my review then refund me, please.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Conelly

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this for a big dog
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this for a big dog. I have a 100 pound Malinois and she got this off in sort order. Hint: it stayed on if I looped the back strap around her collar. Thankfully I have a commercial sewing machine and was able to reinforce and redesign this muzzle so she could not get it off and still be comfortable. But I will say it is nice to have others for the future needs (or friends), and I do have the choice of several sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: There are five for sure! But the smaller the snout fit, the shorter the straps! Not one was good for my 78 lb Black Lab/English Setter mix. She has a normal head but a short distance between the tip of her nose, to below the eye area. I was attempting to treat both eyes with a wash as well as an ointment and I could not use any of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tall Man Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for dogs with short snout
customer_reviews.text: I guess this might be good for big dogs? I have a 6 pound chihuahua mix and none of the sizes fit him. The smallest size muzzle was too tight on him and the next size up was too big. Also, if you're dog has a small snout, these won't fit. My dog has a short snout and the muzzle would dig into his eyes. Some of the reviewers posted pics and those dogs had a long snout and the muzzle fits nicely. Like I said, this might work well with larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: escarTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Muzzle worked great, used the biggest size for our German Shepherd ...
customer_reviews.text: Muzzle worked great, used the biggest size for our German Shepherd for the vet and though he didn’t like wearing it he left it alone for the most part and the few times when he tried to get it off it would not budge. He had to wear it for almost an hour and a half and was completely fine in it. Very nice product and price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Noisy Puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog uses the next size to the largest one. Of course, he hated it. However, he had no choice when my daughter dog sits for me. He likes to bark/whine (he's a HUGE puppy). Unfortunately, my daughters neighbors do not care for the noise ... so I purchased this item and it has helped out greatly in controlling his noise. A very useful item.
customer_reviews.author: hollewood

customer_reviews.title: Was able to use two of the five provided
customer_reviews.text: Bought this particular item because of the number of sizes provided for the price, and I'm glad I did. I have a large Shepherd and a smaller Jack Russell mix. I was able to fit them with two of the muzzles included. Do I consider the other three a waste? Not at all, since I paid for these the same as I would have ONE muzzle from another company. That makes this a better value, and since the quality of these are superior to some I've purchased prior, that makes it an even better value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product was ineffective for us. Our dog continued to bark, and howl while wearing the muzzle. However, he did try to take it off at first and was unable to, so it does stay on better than some. I did enjoy that it came with multiple sizes so we could make sure we got the best fit for our dog. For these reasons I have returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and more durable clips or it's useless after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked well before it broke, and it broke in less than 10 uses. The plastic clip that holds it together cracked on two different sizes with 2 different dog, one of which was only 10 weeks at the time. Needs to be made with stronger, thicker, and more durable clips or it's useless after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lillyjumper192

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality and broke real fast
customer_reviews.text: These are awful, this thing came apart and broke within a month old having it. Took my dog maybe 10 minutes to use her paws and pull it right off and eventually broke the buckle the material is unraveling where her mouth is so it's complete trash such a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs. One large and one medium. None of these sizes fit on either of my dogs. The snout area was so long it covered the dog’s eyes before the end of their nose made it out of the other end. Not sure what kind of animal these are supposed to fit but they didn’t work on my dogs. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works for my 3 different sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs. Two of them like to nip at each other. I bought this pack so I would have a better chance of getting the correct size muzzle. I use these for my dogs only when they have been naughty by fighting with each other. My smaller dogs are not able to bark with the muzzle on but my large dog is still able to, even though the muzzle appears to fit her appropriately. They stay in place well and despite their best efforts, my dogs have been unable to remove the muzzle themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you don't get the two clips you need for each ...
customer_reviews.text: you don't get the two clips you need for each one you only get one clip I ordered these cause i have more then one dog I wanted to use these on. In other words if you want to use two of these you have to purchase more clips to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda May

customer_reviews.title: SAFE AND SECURE
customer_reviews.text: We have several different size dogs so this was a great buy. Surely one of these will fit. Soft, washable, quality material. It is roomy for my dogs snout allowing them to open slightly but not able to bite. We use this as a proactive preventive when taking our dogs in public to a new area or introducing to other dogs. They have never bitten anyone or another dog but you never know. They know now when they get the muzzle something positive is about to happen.
customer_reviews.author: PugsyMom#1

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: Come in multiple sizes. The second biggest one works great on my 95 pound white shepherd. Each size has its own clasps, and you just have to hook up the strap that secures it to the collar. You only get one of those which is cool, but not so much if you have multiple dogs LOL
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not too useful
customer_reviews.text: This set looked very promising and I read other reviews about it before purchasing. I have a pomeranian and she has a small nose. The smallest muzzle was too tight on her and the next one up was a little too big she pretty much wiped it off her nose with one paw. The other ones didn't fit any or my other dogs either.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality, unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: As a Veterinary Assistant who offers in-home pet care services, having reliable muzzles is crutial to my safety. I now feel very confident in working with even the most uncooperative patients. These are strong and durable and the different sizes are great! I now have the perfect size muzzle for every pet! This pack as been a wonderful addition to my kit! Thank you so much Ewinever for providing such a great product at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it, and I love it, lol
customer_reviews.text: Dog hates it, and I love it, lol. Can't complain about the price and they do the job. I'm using these to train a Husky pup who loves to bite and chew on everything and I knew I'd need a larger size in the future.. so this was a great solution. They aren't amazing quality or anything, just average but they do the job. My dog can loosen the muzzle cords but a simple knot fixes that (or you could shorten it and use a lighter to seal it).
customer_reviews.author: Seane

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I know this order comes with a million sizes, but it's actually worth it to ensure you find one that actually fits your pup! This made things really convenient! Although the material is light, this is the first mussle I've found that still allows my Aussie to drink water without chewing or finding another way to remove it. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them
customer_reviews.text: These are not really as I thought they would be. Of all the sizes I still could not find one to fit right on any of my 3 dogs. And.. Only one buckle comes with them. You have to change the buckle to any size you would like to use. No go for me
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: wasted my money and time
customer_reviews.text: If you have a very hyper dog, or a dog that is big, strong, and would over power your strength, don't even bother buying these "muzzles". They do absolutely nothing. Maybe they'll work with a dog and cat that won't move an inch if you're trying to put this over their faces, but in general, these aren't the best.
customer_reviews.author: Betina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: They fit my dog well as she grew. I wish the material was more breathable but this stuff is pretty tough. She's not able to tear it off. Ease of adjustment means I can loosen it to allow her snacks and food and tighten it to prevent and nipping or barking.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Browder

customer_reviews.title: Great for the anxious hair brushing
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates to be brushed! He has always fought me on it but lately he has started to nip at me so I decided to get this muzzle for brushing time. This was perfect for my need. I loved that I have different sizes to choose from because I didn’t know which one to get for him. It was very simple to put on him and he didn’t love it at first but was fine after a second (until I started brushing). He was good though and could still eat little treats I bribe him with to sit still.
customer_reviews.author: SamG

customer_reviews.title: The middle size came with a broken strap, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The middle size came with a broken strap, the second smallest is too short to go around the dogs head that it fits and the fourth largest the dogs seem to get out of just by shaking their heads.. Not too safe to use with dangerous doggies.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pewitt

customer_reviews.title: Not made to stay on
customer_reviews.text: They're not very durable and the strap will slide if you've got a pup that's determined to remove it. I mostly got this for the smaller sizes to keep the tiniest puppies from licking/biting my sharp tools. If taped down and only used for a few minutes, it's not too bad a product. Otherwise, stick to the heavier duty muzzles for the "meaner" pups.
customer_reviews.author: Kara S.

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: The price is ok. But the sizes from big to small was a dislike. I have 2 Rottweilers. And I end up buying these items. But only one out of the set fits only one dog . And I can't find another to fit my other dog. If I would had known this, I would had only bought 2 separate muzzles. Instead of buying a set. I know I could had returned them. But why go through the hassle when you would think, by buying a set . You would think that you have the correct sizes
customer_reviews.author: Lee J.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BECAUSE OF THE DIFFERENT SIZES
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BECAUSE OF THE DIFFERENT SIZES, ONE OF MY DOGS TAKES ONE SIZE AND ANOTHER DOG TAKES ANOTHER SIZE. I USE THEM TO CALM THEM DOWN WHEN THE GET OVER EXCITED AND CAN'T SEEM TO STOP BARKING, I PUT IT ON AND SET A TIMER FOR 5 MIN. THEY CALM DOWN AND STOP BARKING AND WHEN TIMER GOES OFF I TAKE IT OFF. ALSO NEED TO USE WHEN I TRIM THEIR NAILS.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY GORDON

customer_reviews.title: These muzzles by Ewin are great. They are light and flexible unlike other hard ...
customer_reviews.text: These muzzles by Ewin are great. They are light and flexible unlike other hard plastic muzzles. The only drawback is Ewin sends you a pack of multi-sizes to fit your pet, once you find the right size what do you do with the others? We donated the rest to our dog shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: very cheap, my dogs was able to open their ...
customer_reviews.text: very cheap, my dogs was able to open their jaws and rip threw the fabric do not suggest buying for dogs that have bigger mouths. they will rip threw the fabric. it is very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved that it came in so many sizes
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came in so many sizes. I was able to fit one perfectly to my dog. Stays on no matter how hard he try's to get it off. I purchased it because on walks, my dog will try and eat everything. This has worked perfectly. Great product that I would buy again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: J Wat

customer_reviews.title: They pull them off VERY easily.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I have two dogs that don't get along. I thought I could use these as an aid while re introducing them. They are very dangerous even for supervised use. They pull them off VERY easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lexey Kutchman

customer_reviews.title: Similar to the ones our vet uses
customer_reviews.text: These are great muzzles for keeping our dogs a bit more calm while clipping their nails. Our vet actually suggested we try this and it worked out pretty well. They are lightweight and easy to use. This was the sole purpose of buying these. We actually only use two of the sizes, but we've had dogs all our lives, so they all might come in handy at one point!
customer_reviews.author: ~purplemoon~

customer_reviews.title: Great when u dont know what size u need
customer_reviews.text: I bought several muzzles b4 that didn't fit or work for my dog who bites when clipping his nails. These had several sizes so I got 1 that fits. They are kind of a canvas material. I don't think they will last a long time but they work for now. I gave the ones that didn't fit to my groomer.
customer_reviews.author: some beach

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: I it briefly while I was raising a pup. My older female gets aggravated with pups sometimes so to avoid any unnecessary accidents I'd put this on her. They are hard to get out of, trust me she tried and only succeeded once and seem to be of decent quality. Definitely not intended for aggressive dogs, just casual use.
customer_reviews.author: ShepLady

customer_reviews.title: display one of these and the bored barking stops
customer_reviews.text: These are used as a reminder. The lesson works, display one of these and the bored barking stops. Great visual deterrent!
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: perfect for that noisy dog
customer_reviews.text: I only needed two of these as I have two dogs. The one actually doesn't even need it, but it is such a great value. They have lasted and are great for when you have guest over and know all they will do is bark and growl. I actually should buy it again, as I might have misplaced the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for barking & training
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use on our strong willed German Shepherd puppy. The varying sizes have grown right along with her & been great. However, our adult shepherds gave the larger sizes a work over in short order & the nylon fabric tore at the seams with their efforts to remove them. None of the dogs were able to get them off & could drink with them on.
customer_reviews.author: NC reader

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a LIFESAVER!!! I have 3 very talkative dogs. A small, and two different sized large dogs. Before getting these, I had to hold my dogs mouth shut and keep them in one spot when they would bark at people walking by or coming into the house. Now, all I do is put the muzzle on and they are able to move around all they want! My youngest also likes to scream when she’s locked in the crate (when we leave for work) so this has helped us not get reported to the landlord for her excessive barking. I definitely recommend these. They’re easy to use and a sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: MCH

customer_reviews.title: disapointed in the size of straps
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. I found that the strap that is not connected to the palastic clasp provided is NOT long enough for a secure and safe fit. The only way it would work is if you are willing to sew the strap permanently onto the plastic clasp provided, and have sort of way to loosen or tighten. But then again there was very little to none extra to do so.
customer_reviews.author: mistie

customer_reviews.title: Not durable do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these knowing I just wanted to train the dogs. I was not sure of sizes so this worked to figure out what sizes I need but I will have to go buy new ones because not even 5 min of them being on my dogs they were broken the fabric ripped and got stuck on my dogs nose if I was not right there when it happened he could have been hurt.
customer_reviews.author: cyclemom22

customer_reviews.title: OK, but don’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Only one fits my dog, seems like waste. But they don’t last long so I’ve taken parts of the other ones and made a new one. Doesn’t hurt my dog or leave rub spots. Don’t leave your dog unsupervised with one on.
customer_reviews.author: scf

customer_reviews.title: ****very durable, and many sizes, will grow with my German Shepherd puppy****
customer_reviews.text: I like first off,that this multiple package will grow with my puppy. There well made, and my gsd has plenty of room to still drink! It calms her down within seconds after putting it on,after terrorizing my house! My child can actually sit and play nice with our pup. I like the durability of the material in this product. Stong,does what it's supposed to do,calms and stop's the destruction of my house. After I removed it she stays calm! She tried to get it off at first but gives in after she realizes she cannot! Well made and multiple sizes from little to WOW. My 3 month old is stage 2,and they get much bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Tech-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Professional Groomer
customer_reviews.text: They are ok for what you pay but a hassle to loosen and I loosen due to the “safety” precautions. I groom many highly aggressive dogs and I need to be able to easily slip them on and off the dog quickly and smoothly for less stress not tug and fight.
customer_reviews.author: wolfgurl

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Came needing some tweaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my mini dachshund. They tend to be super tight around the muzzle. Turned my puppies tongue blue once. I used these to keep him from chewing on cords while I was away at work. I had to take the buckle off and turn it around for better adjustment. But never came off. Overall great value for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D Kister

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product not durable not presentable
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the texture or the style of these muscles they are very very uncomfortable for dogs and puppies and they don’t have a Good appearance. I felt so bad the second I put it on my puppy my kids even said that she looked very sad and they didn’t like it so I bought a different one and it’s much better.
customer_reviews.author: Uniqueness2902

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit fir our dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs, one a Minipin and the other a Chihuahua-Feist mix. I was so pleased to find that the two smaller muzzles fit them perfectly. We are finally able to trim their nails ourselves...especially the Minipin...he snaps when you try to do it. He was calm throughout the process for once. Would recommend these to anyone who only needs a muzzle occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: TerribleTigger

customer_reviews.title: Great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to get the dog to stop barking. Used the biggest one on my golden lab. It fits nicely and leaves enough room to drink, but not enough to want to bark. If you have a bigger dog it might not work. The smallest one fits my cat. Kinda runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Gi-Gantor

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these, I didn't even have it ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these, I didn't even have it on our puppy for an hour and it was already broken. I even measured to make sure I was using the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Buice

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is good. I was disappointed in the sizes and adjustments. I verified it would fit my oldest dog and it doesn't at all. It does fit my husky pup, but even still they are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mantle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: VERY cheaply made. The material ripped in literally seconds. Do not buy for a dangerous animal. It will not prevent them from biting. The straps also have no backing so it doesn't stay tight.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit our dog
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there was not a muzzle in this set that fit our dog. He is a 70lb pitbull. The largest one fit around his mouth but left too much leeway for him to still be able to bite if he wanted to, and the next size down was entirely too small :( Not a good fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Aleisa Krug

customer_reviews.title: This is a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the price and quality is just perfect and we'll over met my expectation. My mini-aussie has some really bad issues biting stuff while we're gone. Since she's still a pup we can easily size up if we have to. I didn't even expect a size for my old man. This is a must buy for future pet owners or puppies who keep tearing stuff apart.
customer_reviews.author: AngelM

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One buckle was broken and would not latch. Put muzzle on small dog and she had it off and torn within 10 minutes. Very cheaply made. You really do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: trikar57

customer_reviews.title: Yes, but unfortunately too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my dog (Labrador and pit mix) and his friend plays rough and sometimes they leave cuts on each other. This product came very fast and packaged nicely. The material is nice and seems very durable for my purpose the only downside is it was too small. I really wish it would’ve fit him, my dog is huge, even the largest size was too small to go over his nose. So I’ll have to return this and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Nok

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that these are great. Because they are inexpensive and come in a ...
customer_reviews.text: We run a small dog kennel. I have to say that these are great. Because they are inexpensive and come in a varying amount of sizes its easy to find which will work perfectly. With any muzzle you want it to fit snugly so the animal will be unable to remove it. Over time these may wear out and I may purchase new ones. However, they seem to be durable, lightweight and comfortable. I couldn't ask for a better muzzle. Other muzzles cost much more and are very bulky and uncomfortable for the animal.
customer_reviews.author: Kati LeQuia

customer_reviews.title: Idid not fit my dog: ( they should at ...
customer_reviews.text: Idid not fit my dog :( they should at least mention what dog this would work with!
customer_reviews.author: Toufic Kourbeh

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing to quiet down the dogs at night, they will bark at anything so these definitely come in handy
customer_reviews.author: mayra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Non porous cheap plastic material used. You cannot tell from the photos either. OK if you intend to keep them on the dogs for minutes at a time. I would advise never using these for a long period.
customer_reviews.author: Heymrpaul

customer_reviews.title: This set worked great, had the size I needed and he didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we have a Goldendoodle puppy who needed his nails trimmed. Puppy teeth are very sharp, and since this is a large breed dog, I knew whatever I bought now, would not fit in a month. This set worked great, had the size I needed and he didn't even fight much once it was on. I am really happy with the quality. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Aumann

customer_reviews.title: Great price for multipack
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 inside dogs are barkers. These fit comfortably well and discourage barking when visitors are here. They are able to yip-bark but give it up quickly. Our dogs use the S, M and XL so I was greatful for being able to purchase in a multipack not knowing which sizes would fit. I must be honest...one of them came unsewn along the snout the first use but it was easily repaired by hand stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Barton

customer_reviews.title: Material not sturdy and buckle kept falling off when I tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog was able to destroy this quick! Material not sturdy and buckle kept falling off when I tried to get it in her neck. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy p

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for your dog. I have a little dog that needs medicine in her eyes and she is sweet as pie except when you add her eye meds. This helped both of us. I love that you get several sizes as we weren't sure which size she would wear and also that the price was so reasonable. Highly recommended. They are comfortable and easy to use with the least amount of discomfort for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Linniew3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t chew or fight so durability wasn’t a concern as much but she could drink which was perfect and there was so many sizes to accompany her growing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Technically the product is as advertised and the low rating is just because it didn't fit my needs. I only wanted to use the large muzzle - I have only one dog - but the it was not big enough for my dog/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Multiple Sizes
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of muzzles. These are inexpensive. They work well when you foster multiple sized dogs and occasionally need a muzzle or are working on training a dog to except a muzzle. It is also great to have sizes which are not the normal size for when you need to brush an aggressive dog's teeth or get a piller in an aggressive dog.
customer_reviews.author: FurrykidsMom

customer_reviews.title: Not for strong dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Will probally work for small dogs. Mine is a "pocket" pit. She is 55-58 lbs. She broke it immediately. We will now have to use anesthesia to have her darn toenails clipped. We have tried everything big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap clip. Seems comfortable. Better suited for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This product would probably work better for better, more calm, and more obedient dogs than my own. First time on, it took less than fifteen minutes and my dog was able to this off, and rip it to shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it was a good muzzle 3 years ago...
customer_reviews.text: Really simple, they give a variety of useless sizes. My pomeranian had a field day barking with it on. Also i had to tailor the smallest size because it reached all the way to his eyes. Worse than my old muzzle that he chewed up
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected for my older dogs who needed to go to a curbside clinic during the COVID pandemic. I wasn't sure they needed them, but prevented any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If you're not sure which size your dog wears or if you have multiple dogs (same or different breeds), I would recommend you to get this set of 5 muzzles. They're made of good quality material. My 14-month old GSD (80 lbs.) wears the third one (from smallest to largest). And my chihuahuas (red-nose Chihuahua and apple-head Chihuahua) wear the smallest one or the second smallest.
customer_reviews.author: TrocheFam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Product is just two years old and has been giving me issues for a few months. Power doesn’t stay on, sometimes power switch doesn’t work, now the battery is loose and doesn’t maintain contact. Expected longer use especially since I’ve tsken care of this so well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: But unfortunately for me my dog at least one of them has too big of a melon and it does not work for my other dog it's fine. The strap that goes around the neck for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well this product is 5 peaces as advertised. But unfortunately for me my dog at least one of them has too big of a melon and it does not work for my other dog it's fine. The strap that goes around the neck for the largest one about 2 in short maybe three. Unfortunately I am one of those people that do not have a flexible tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: G Tanker

customer_reviews.title: My bulldog thinks its better than MyPillow 👍 I agree
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my Morkie. Now, my bulldog is enjoying his quiet time, especially in the evening. My bulldog thinks its better than MyPillow 👍 I agree. This product gets a two paws up😊
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't spend a lot more money for other "better" looking products! These are just what they need to be AND you get multiple sizes. So you're not stuck trying to measure your dogs snout to order one. They definitely aren't fancy but they get the job done and are put together well.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Willis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone like me who can't figure out what ...
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something for my dog to wear when going to the vet. This was cheap and came in lots of sizes. Perfect for someone like me who can't figure out what their dog needs.
customer_reviews.author: JenTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Stiff & all sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: All the sizes were too small, even the large was too small and it did not allow even small stretching, seemed uncomfortable, unfortunately bought 2 sets that were tossed out.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: What's to say about a muzzle other than it fits?
customer_reviews.text: Just took FOREVER to receive, I have tried to figure out what is missing based upon other reviews as all 5 look like complete muzzles to us. They ALL have a clip to go behind the head. Other than that, what's to say about a muzzle? ONE of the 5 fit our little mini aussie's face without covering his eyes, etc. Now we just have to use it and I hate to!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Red

customer_reviews.title: Did not prevent dog from barking
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. It did nothing to stop the dog from barking and blocked the dog from breathing clear.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting your dogs nails clipped because this product is ...
customer_reviews.text: well I spent a lot of money on this muzzle for my dog and it turns out it already has a hole on it due to her scratching her nails on the muzzle. I would recommend getting your dogs nails clipped because this product is poorly made. Otherwise I would give the rating possibly a 3-4
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't fit very well. And wouldn't stay. connection piece kept coming out the buckle piece. Dog took it off pretty much right away. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until my dog figured out how to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Great for first aid kit
customer_reviews.text: Could immediately tell which muzzle will fit my dog in case of emergency injury, pulled that one out, added it to her first aid kit, done. Hope we won't need it but easy to use if we do
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I bought these dog muzzle suit for my 6 small dogs. Easy to put it on your dog and I can know cut my dog's nail without being scary, I truly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalidia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my Australian Kattle dog who loves to bite, and whenever she bites we normally would smack her nose and tell her no sternly. When that stopped working I bought this to try it out and we keep it on for maybe 5-30 mins and after she’ll stop biting for the day. Best purchase I have ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Yullisa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Material
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this item. The material is thin and flimsy. Also, there are no instructions for attaching the strap to the safety clip. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReader

customer_reviews.title: perfect set
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect set of muzzles for my dogs. I have two pit bulls and the largest size works well for both of them. One is very afraid and aggressive towards other dogs and barks at this. This keeps her still able to go out in public and makes her and I feel more secure. I use the other for when my dog needs his ears cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: probably should connect these to a collar for our dogs seem to be able to get them off. they do prevent them from howling/barking. humbles them. all i have to do is show it to them and they run!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Headrick

customer_reviews.title: good variety of sizes
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have a variety of sizes on hand. The muzzle fits nicely and is easy to put on. Very helpful when grooming the front feet.
customer_reviews.author: JBZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These muzzles come in so many sizes for cheap. There is one that will fit your animal. Helps calm them so you can do things like trim nails safely or clean ears safely.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to ship but still got it earlier than the EDD I got this because my mini poodle has went blind and that has made him aggressive towards his grooming. This did the trick to control him during the grooming process
customer_reviews.author: HypnoticGalaxy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price= cheap made
customer_reviews.text: My dog HATES men to a point that she wants to EAT them. I got this in hopes of working with her around some men to help her realize they are not all bad. It didn't even last 5 seconds. These are made of a cheap plastic like material comparable to a freezer bag you would get at a grocery store. Save yourself time and $ and spend a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This set of muzzles is a great value, I highly recommend! I used one on my dachshund due to her cantankerous attitude when getting groomed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: Great set of muzzles
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value for a set of muzzles. Similar quality to the ones available at my local vet.
customer_reviews.author: dnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I have a boxer and the largest size didn’t work for him. I had to return. I was bummed out about it.
customer_reviews.author: MsTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Short Strap Muzzles
customer_reviews.text: These were bought because of their high ratings but as a Vet hospital we use these frequently and the straps were too short to be used with multiple breed dogs. All of our other muzzles had straps that were 3 to 4 inches longer. The rest of the muzzle was made well. Dr. Paul
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: None fit any of our dogs and if they did, I would trust them. Buying something else
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

product_meta.title: ewinever Dog Muzzles Suit, Adjustable Breathable Safety Small Medium Large Extra Dog Muzzles for Anti-Biting Anti-Barking Anti-Chewing Safety Protection
feature_bullets: 5 IN 1 Dog Muzzles--5 pieces dog muzzles in each set. Perfect for different size or age dogs. Good value and No trouble for choosing .
Multi-Function--Prevent Dog biting, Barkingand,Chewing licking wounds and other problem.
Adjustable Design--The muzzles have adjustable strap and quick release buckle,making sure the best size for your dog
Breathable and comfortable-- Made of premium material, make your dog safe and comfortable.
Money back guarantee -- If you are not satisfied with our product , feel free to contact us ,we will give you full refund . No risk for you .
